DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: We performed whole exome sequencing (WES) using Hiseq on 22 paired CMLs. We also performed whole exome sequencing (WES) using CG on 88 paired CMLs. All the data belongs to CML in China - ICGC project.
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: We performed whole exome sequencing (WES) using Hiseq on 22 paired CMLs. We also performed whole exome sequencing (WES) using CG on 88 paired CMLs.All the data belongs to CML in China - ICGC project.
